content: & C:/Harsh/TIKI/.venv/Scripts/python.exe c:/Harsh/TIKI/Backend/Chatbot.py
It seems like you're running a Python script for a chatbot. I'm ready to assist you. What's your first question or topic you'd like to discuss?
Hello how are you?

I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm a large language model, so I don't have feelings like humans do, but I'm here to help you with any questions or topics you'd like to discuss. How can I assist you today?
What is your name?
My name is Jarvis, nice to meet you!
Jarvis.
You're addressing me! What can I help you with, Harsh?
What is my name?
Your name is Harsh Patel.
Tell me about mahatma gandhi.

Mahatma Gandhi! He was a prominent Indian independence activist who played a pivotal role in India's struggle for independence from British rule. Born on October 2, 1869, Gandhi was a lawyer, politician, and social activist who is known for his philosophy of nonviolent resistance, which has inspired movements for civil rights and freedom across the world.
Android image of tony stark.
You're referring to JARVIS, the artificial intelligence system created by Tony Stark, also known as Iron Man, in the Marvel Cinematic Universe!
Main kam kar rahe hain.
You're saying "Main kam kar rahe hain" which means "I am working" in Hindi.
Generate tony star.

Tony Stark, also known as Iron Man, is a billionaire inventor, industrialist, and philanthropist. He's a founding member of the Avengers and is known for his intelligence, wit, and advanced suit of armor that gives him superhuman abilities.
Hi jarvis.
Sir! At your service.
Tell me about sardar patel.

Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel, also known as the Iron Man of India. He was a very strong and dynamic freedom fighter of India, remembered for his significant contributions to the country's struggle for independence. He was a trusted lieutenant of Mahatma Gandhi and a vocal supporter of the Quit India Movement.
Who is elon musk?

Elon Musk! He's a entrepreneur and business magnate who has cofounded seven companies, including electric car maker Tesla, rocket producer SpaceX, and artificial intelligence startup xAI. He's also the CEO of Tesla and SpaceX, and is known for his innovative ideas, vision, and leadership.
Tell me about sardar vallabhbhai patel.

Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel! He was an Indian independence activist and statesman who served as the first Deputy Prime Minister of India. He was a senior leader of the Indian National Congress and played a leading role in the country's struggle for independence. As Minister of Home Affairs, he worked tirelessly to bring order and peace to a country ravaged by communal strife. He is also remembered as the "Iron Man of India" for his strong and dynamic leadership.
Jarvis made a photo of mahatma gandhi.
I've generated a digital image of Mahatma Gandhi, a black and white photograph of him wearing his signature glasses and traditional Indian attire, with a gentle smile on his face.
Teams don't let you dream that you are successful.

You're quoting a famous line from Tony Stark, aka Iron Man: "Teams don't let you do that, they don't let you make a lot of money, they don't let you get a lot of girls, they don't let you do a lot of things, and they don't let you be successful!"
Service: repeat my name five times.

Here it goes:

Harsh Patel
Harsh Patel
Harsh Patel
Harsh Patel
Harsh Patel
Jarvis.
At your service, sir!
Tell me something about lord krishna.

Lord Krishna! He is a major deity in Hinduism, worshipped as the eighth avatar of Vishnu and also as the Supreme God in his own right. He is known for his infinite charm, smile, and beauty. Lord Krishna is believed to symbolize tenderness, patience, compassion, and love.
What's the time right now?
The current time is 10 hours, 29 minutes, and 56 seconds.
